<h3 id="X38022">X(38022) = CENTROID OF TRIANGLE {X(1), X(2), X(5)}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 8*a^4-6*(b+c)*a^3-(13*b^2-12*b*c+13*c^2)*a^2+6*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a+5*(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(38022) = X(1)+2*X(547) = 5*X(2)+X(1482) = 4*X(2)-X(5690) = X(2)+2*X(5901) = 7*X(2)+5*X(10595) = 13*X(2)-X(12245) = 11*X(2)+X(34631) = 7*X(2)-X(34718) = 4*X(1482)+5*X(5690) = X(1482)-10*X(5901) = 13*X(1482)+5*X(12245) = 11*X(1482)-5*X(34631) = 7*X(1482)+5*X(34718) = 3*X(1482)+5*X(38066) = X(5690)+8*X(5901) = 7*X(5690)+20*X(10595) = 13*X(5690)-4*X(12245) = 11*X(5690)+4*X(34631) = 7*X(5690)-4*X(34718) = 3*X(5690)-4*X(38066)</b>
<p>X(38022) lies on these lines: {1,547}, {2,1482}, {5,551}, {8,15703}, {30,1699}, {40,11812}, {140,3656}, {355,10109}, {376,18493}, {381,3616}, {515,38071}, {516,38080}, {517,11539}, {518,38079}, {519,10172}, {524,38040}, {527,38041}, {528,38044}, {529,38045}, {549,1125}, {632,13464}, {944,19709}, {946,8703}, {952,5055}, {962,15693}, {1385,3845}, {1387,10056}, {1656,3241}, {3058,37735}, {3338,19919}, {3524,28174}, {3530,11522}, {3545,10246}, {3564,38023}, {3582,5425}, {3622,5071}, {3624,3654}, {3628,3679}, {3636,37705}, {3655,5066}, {3817,23046}, {3828,24680}, {3839,28186}, {3853,30389}, {3860,5691}, {4297,33699}, {4301,14869}, {4428,6924}, {4669,33179}, {4870,6147}, {5054,5603}, {5067,31145}, {5434,5443}, {5550,15694}, {5731,14269}, {5762,38025}, {5818,34748}, {5843,38024}, {5844,19875}, {5881,12812}, {6361,15700}, {7982,16239}, {7987,15690}, {7988,14892}, {8148,15723}, {9778,15706}, {9779,28190}, {9812,15689}, {9955,15687}, {10072,37737}, {10165,17504}, {10171,38138}, {10680,17542}, {11278,19878}, {11376,15170}, {11849,36006}, {12100,16192}, {12101,34628}, {12699,34200}, {12702,15702}, {13624,15686}, {14893,18481}, {15688,28178}, {15701,34632}, {15714,31730}, {16417,33814}, {16858,22765}, {18483,35404}, {19710,22793}, {19711,31663}, {26286,28463}, {28461,37535}, {34627,37624}, {35018,37727}</p>
<p>
X(38022) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {3545, 10246}, {3653, 38021}, {5054, 5603}, {5731, 14269}, {5886, 25055}, {9812, 15689}, {10283, 15699}<br>
X(38022) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (11539, 19883), (15699, 11230), (17504, 10165), (23046, 3817), (38028, 25055), (38042, 15699), (38081, 38083)<br>
X(38022) = complement of X(38066)<br>
X(38022) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (2, 10595, 34718), (3624, 3654, 10124), (3653, 5886, 38021), (3655, 8227, 5066), (5886, 38028, 38034), (10283, 11230, 38042), (15699, 38081, 38083), (18481, 30308, 14893), (25055, 38021, 3653), (38081, 38083, 38042), (38084, 38085, 5055)<br>
</p>
